I use ant task <batchtest> to run a series of tests for my application. Off late, I have been getting the following error that causes my tests to fail, that is, this error is generated during the execution of my tests. A typical scenario is that first 6 test run fine, and the seventh test has this problem which makes the test to fail. And all the following tests fail as well.

[java] #

[java] # HotSpot Virtual Machine Error, Internal Error

[java] # Please report this error at

[java] # http://java.sun.com/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi

[java] #

[java] # Error ID: 47454E45524154452F4F502D41500E4350500842

[java] #

[java] # Problematic Thread: prio=5 tid=0x8a44e68 nid=0x6c0 runnable

[java] #

[java] Java Result: 1

 

Any suggestions.

TIA,

Vikas
